objects.name: default
objects.description: The path tracer supports soft shadows, indirect illumination and realistic materials.

parameters.name: minContribution
parameters.description: sample contributions below this value will be neglected to speedup rendering

parameters.name: lightSamples
parameters.description: number of random light samples per path vertex, per default all light sources are sampled

parameters.name: roulettePathLength
parameters.description: ray recursion depth at which to start Russian roulette termination

parameters.name: maxScatteringEvents
parameters.description: maximum number of non-specular (i.e., diffuse and glossy) bounces

parameters.name: maxContribution
parameters.description: samples are clamped to this value before they are accumulated into the framebuffer

parameters.name: backgroundRefraction
parameters.description: allow for alpha blending even if background is seen through refractive objects like glass

parameters.name: denoiseAlpha
parameters.description: whether to denoise the alpha channel as well
